ul.li: The "background-spacing" property sets the background spacing of an element.

body.p: If statement above is true, the flag image of this paragraph should have a background spacing of 50px. The rule applied is "p {background-spacing: 50px;}" Also "p {background-image: url(flagbg.gif);}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.h3: This h3 heading should have a background spacing of 0 for its oval button image. The rule applied is "h3 {background-spacing: 0;}" Also "h3 {background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif);}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph like the one above. However, it may not be long enough for a background image.
